Paraclinical
- Proteinuria > 4,5g/24h => Clinical > 3g/24h
- Albumin on the blood decrease: < 25g/L =>Clinical: < 30g/L
- Protein in the blood decrease: < 50g/L => Clinical < 60g/L
- Hyperlipidemia: increase cholesteron > 5.5mmol/L. 
- Increase triglyceride. Increase phospholipid.
